SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
M/V LODUR REPORTS CREWMAN REQUIRING
MEDICAL ASSISTANCE IN 28-00.04S 007-07.25W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY ABLE TO PROVIDE MEDICAL
ASSISTANCE REQUESTED TO ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
PLEASE REPORT TO CAPE TOWN RADIO,
TF: 0027 21 5510700,
EMAIL: MARITIMERADIO@TELKOM.CO.ZA,
OR MRCC CAPE TOWN,
TF: 0027 21 9383300,
EMAIL: MRCC.CT@SAMSA.ORG.ZA.
